name: Gates of Adrona
description:
Gates of Adrona

Gates of Adrona is an action oriented space combat game.
-
As of now the game has halted development, but this build offers a brief introduction to the core mechanics and gameplay.
-
There is multiple levels and a boss fight, along with customization, upgrading, and unlocking new content.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Installation Instructions

1. Download the zip file that's appropriate for your operating system.
2. Double click the downloaded zip file. This either opens it up in Explorer
3. Right click in the middle of your opened window and select Extract All -
4. Choose an installation location of your choice.
5. Run the a game from the folder you extracted it to!

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
